<h1 align = "center">🔥stopwords-zh🔥</h1>

---
### 欢迎提交更新，共建中文停用词库

# Install
```python
pip install -U stopwords-zh
```

# [Docs](https://yuanjie-ai.github.io/stopwords-zh/)

# Usages
```
from stopwords import stopwords

print(stopwords())
```
